p: Olive oil contains 85% of unsaturated fatty acids, in particular 70% of monounsaturated (mainly oleic and palmitoleic acid) and about 15% of polyunsaturated ones (mainly linoleic and linolenic acid). On the contrary, sesame oil contains about 85% unsaturated acids; mono- and poly-unsaturated acids, which are present in comparable amounts (41% of polyunsaturated – linoleic acid and 39% of monounsatured – oleic acid).
